school_name: Community College of Baltimore County - Essex
tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Caring (1)
comments: The course is a little tough because your whole grade depends on 4 tests and one research essay, so if you do bad on any single assignment, say good-bye to a good grade. The course material is straightforward, and as long as you study for those tests, you should receive an A or a B.

school_name: Community College of Baltimore County - Essex
tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Caring (1)
comments: He\'s a good teacher, a little unclear at times. You have a few tests on about 3/4 chapters at a time. You have a research paper he tells you about at the beginning, that he takes very seriously. You take a lot of notes from the powerpoint\'s which he makes using the book. I wouldn\'t take him again, but he wasn\'t the worst. A little boring, though.

comments: Taking this class online and so far it is hard with a lot of work but it is very interesting and well organized. You know what is due and when. If you need to take an online class, take this one with this teacher. He is a great teacher. I had him for another class and I loved it. He will help you if you ask. Hard on grading papers. No excuses.

school_name: Community College of Baltimore County - Essex
tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  Gives good feedback (3)  Respected (2)  Amazing lectures (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (2)  Inspirational (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Caring (1)
comments: At first I was like "What did I get myself into?" However Prof. Richick was a great teacher! He was quick in answering questions via email, gave extra credit on assignments if he felt you went above and beyond. Gave out very detailed study guides for exams. Really enjoyed the class and learned a lot. Do the readings and study and you\'ll do well.
